_FC_VarExodusIOInfo Struct Reference
[(Private Exodus IO)]

#include <exodusioP.h>

Collaboration diagram for _FC_VarExodusIOInfo:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Struct hold info about the file format for variable.

Description:

Need to keep type of var and it's index. global vars cannot be read lazily.

Modifications:

  • 9/02/2005 WSD Created.
  • 9/09/2007 ACG added attrIndex for basic var. I think this really could just use the varIndex since we know otherwise if its a seq or basic var (note that FC_AT_WHOLE_MESH is not an attr). Probably could even drop this if didn't do lazy loading
